segments.text: I peer into the kitchen and feel a pang of worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is focused on her dish, unaware of the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is flooding out, creating a sad mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It'll ruin the floor and cabinets if it keeps going.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so vulnerable up there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, and he'll crash down painfully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly, but this could end in heartbreak.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're just kids wanting cookies, but the risks are too high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman missing it all makes me feel sorry for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the tears if an accident happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunny garden outside seems distant from this potential sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them to prevent the sadness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a reminder of how fragile these moments can be.
segments.speaker: PAR
